title: 服务器中的木牌商店用不了
author: KPP
txt_content:
输入/qs后只会显示
/qs
/qs
一直这样,是插件冲突吗

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
推荐使用重制版：
http://ci.yumc.pw/job/QuickShop/ ... arget/QuickShop.jar

replies.author: KPP
replies.txt_content:
hcrgm1 发表于 2016-6-15 13:25
嗯，我目前也是用这个呢
记得把之前的qs插件删了
好吧,谢了...别给我装什么莫名其妙的插件=m=

replies.author: KPP
replies.txt_content:
hcrgm1 发表于 2016-6-15 13:12

http://ci.yumc.pw/job/QuickShop/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/QuickShop.jar ...
